title: Connecting communities in the city: the role of cultural intermediaries and cultural learning
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This was a small grant intended to form the process of writing a larger grant and as such has no major impact for users beyond the academy, although it did secure a further grant in 2011. Creative Economy Cultural
findingsText: This was a development grant which funded the writing of a bid for the larger project which was funded in 2011. They highlighted some issues with the ways that cultural intermediation was being funded in the post-2010 austerity era. These are being explored in the follow-up large grant. Creative Economy
